WRA EMPLOYEE NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT.

AS EMPLOYEE OF THE WEDNESDAY RESEARCH ASSOCIATION, YOU UNDERSTAND THAT BY VIRTUE OF YOUR DUTIES IN THE WEDNESDAY RESEARCH ASSOCIATION, YOU MAY BE THE RECIPIENT OF INFORMATION AND INTELLIGENCE WHICH CONCERNS THE PRESENT AND FUTURE SECURITY OF THE WEDNESDAY RESEARCH ASSOCIATION AND WHICH BELONGS TO THE WEDNESDAY RESEARCH ASSOCIATION. THIS INFORMATION AND INTELLIGENCE, TOGETHER WITH THE METHODS OF COLLECTING AND HANDLING IT, ARE CLASSIFIED ACCORDING TO THE SECURITY STANDARDS SET BY THE WEDNESDAY RESEARCH ASSOCIATION. YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTOOD THE PROVISIONS OF THE CLASSIFIED EXPERIMENTAL DATA GUIDELINES, CONCERNING THE DISCLOSURE OF EXPERIMENTAL AND CLASSIFIED INFORMATION RELATING TO THE WEDNESDAY RESEARCH ASSOCIATION AND ARE FAMILIAR WITH THE PENALTIES PROVIDED FOR VIOLATION THEREOF.
